item.title: 我的第一个python程序
item.description: 参考pandas官网，十分钟教程 import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt s = pd.Series([1,3,5,np.nan,6,8]) print(s) ## 0 1.0 ## 1 3.0 ## 2 5.0 ## 3 NaN ## 4 6.0 ## 5 8.0 ## dtype: float64
